======================================================================== 
    CTR :  freetype Project Overview
======================================================================== 

This freetype project is created using CTR Project Wizard.

This file includes the outline of each file which configures project.

freetype.vcproj 
    This is a main project file of the project generated by using an Application Wizard.
    This includes information such as the version of the product which generated the file, the platform selected in Application Wizard, structure, and project functions.

freetype.h, freetype.cpp
    This is template source of library.

freetype.ctropt
    This is a file that manages property of CTR project. 

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Version of CTR-SDK :

freetype project supports CTR-SDK 0.12.1.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
Notes : 

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
